attributes.action: Revoke and then resign Article 50 - once we have a plan.
attributes.additional_details: Only the UK will suffer from a no-deal Brexit. Other companies in Europe will prosper from UK companies not being able to compete passed non-EU tarriffs. The arrangment being forced on the UK is a financial-punishment which will take many decades to recover from, and out wieghs the loss of trade from a no-deal. We need time to plan and arrange an exit from the EU that does not rely on EU agreements.
attributes.background: Theresa May has wasted nearly 3-years in fake negotiations with a block of countries that have openly declared economic-war on the British public's wish to leave their Franco-German self-preservation society. Brexiters still want us to honour the referendum, but only once we have a plan to do so.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "revoke and then resign Article 50".

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to see happen.

If you would like a "No deal" Brexit you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
